name: Candy Puzzle Demo
description:
Note: Compatible with Oculus Quest 1/2 only. Virtual Reality Game

Full Version - Click Here

Familiar to play, yet challenging to master, Candy Puzzle brings fresh mind-bending challenges and unanticipated obstacles to the casual phenomenon loved by everyone! Keep your brain fit and boost your problem-solving skills by mastering the tricky levels based on real-life physics. Tired of mind game? Just sit/stand back and enjoy the cheerful and relaxing game atmosphere of one of the most beautiful game for everyone.

=== Features ===

- Easy to challenging levels

- 50+ levels in full version

- Amazing relaxing music and environment

- 90Hz support

Note: We will add more levels in future updates
